page.title: 05Industry/S.Leicester.
page.content: There is a marked contrast between the industrial development in the west of the area and that of the eastern half.Light manufacturing or service industries predominate in the west. There is a scattering of small factories plus the new Blaby Industrial Estate and the more established estate at Wharf Way-Glen Parva.To the east there is a greater concentration of larger and longer established manufacturing enterprises.There are also a number of very specialized engineering works and two small foundries.{Examples to {illustrate contrasting industrial {development- Blaby Industrial Estate-} Adamas - employing 4 people -manufacture industrial diamond tools. {Wharf Way }Ruari-employing 34-make wooden sheds etc.{S.Wigston- } Nabisco-500 employees-biscuit makers.
